data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Mehedinți, Romania that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mehedinți, Romania
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Mehedinți, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.section_summary: On average, 30 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Mehedinți, Romania.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Mehedinți, Romania to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Mehedinți to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Father, I pray that the Tatar people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Tatar people know you.
Spirit, cause the 15,121 believers in Mehedinți to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 15,121 believers in Mehedinți to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 208,622 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
